tool_description: Monitors social media platforms in real-time for specified keywords, hashtags, or brand mentions and streams live updates with configurable filters.

platforms.description: Array of social media platforms to monitor

monitoring_keywords.description: Array of keywords or phrases to monitor

stream_duration_minutes.description: Duration in minutes to run the monitoring stream (1-1440)

update_interval_seconds.description: Interval in seconds between stream updates (10-300)

language_filter.description: Language code for content filtering (en, es, fr, de, etc.)

minimum_followers.description: Minimum follower count for content inclusion (0-1000000)

exclude_retweets.description: Whether to exclude retweets and shares from monitoring

sentiment_filter.description: Filter by sentiment type (all, positive, negative, neutral)

error_messages: Invalid platform: All platforms must be from [twitter, facebook, instagram, linkedin, tiktok, youtube]
Stream duration out of range: stream_duration_minutes must be between 1 and 1440 (24 hours)
Update interval out of range: update_interval_seconds must be between 10 and 300
Too many keywords: Maximum 20 keywords allowed for real-time monitoring
Invalid language code: Provide a valid ISO 639-1 language code
Minimum followers out of range: minimum_followers must be between 0 and 1000000
Invalid sentiment filter: sentiment_filter must be one of [all, positive, negative, neutral]
Authentication failed: Invalid credentials for one or more specified platforms
usage: Specify platforms and keywords to monitor, along with stream duration. Configure optional filters for language, followers, retweets, and sentiment. Returns real-time streaming data.

stream_status.description: Current status of the monitoring stream

total_mentions.description: Total number of mentions captured during stream

mentions_by_platform.description: Array of mention counts for each monitored platform

latest_mentions.description: Array of most recent mention texts

stream_timestamps.description: Array of timestamps for stream updates

mention_timestamps.description: Array of timestamps when mentions were posted
